channel.title: 👻👻 A Spooky Garden on
channel.description: Recent content in 👻👻 A Spooky Garden on

item.title: 03.08 - 06.08.2022 - Den Haag
item.description: Haag Visit Ideas for Jen’s visit to Den Haag Botanical Garden in Delft/Elsewhere Library date Bookclub date Gaming Lesbian Checkers Backgammon rematch!

item.title: bf/gf
item.description: They exist together, they can be any gender, they are just an enigma and a personification of a behaviour. pooping bf, packing gf produce bf, product gf toad bf, frog gf talking gf, listening bf organised gf, chaotic bf compressed bf, uncompressed gf 3am gf, 7am bf coffee gf, croissant bf white coffe bf, black coffe gf analogue bf, digital gf

item.title: Jen on WHTRTP
item.description: General Notes I wanted to read this book because - like Brin - I read a few articles about how Facebook content moderators are affected by their jobs!

item.title: Occultist Poetry
item.description: Possible poetry we shouldn be reading! https://ann.skea.com/Ariel1.html

item.title: 🍳 The Grimoire
item.description: The Grimoire is where we cookup the vilest of spells for the hungries of frogs. List of spells: Przganka

item.title: 🎨 The Zine Workshop
item.description: Small little handcrafted piece of print for each other. A list of ideas Make a zine about how to make zines A ghost’s guide to astrology a haunted crossword puzzle frog and toadification of ghosts

item.title: 🐸 Summoning a Frog
item.description: Summoning Shrine for a Frog The ritual should be performed on a rooftop or mezzanine. For maximum efficiency, please begin the ritual at night, when the stars are bright and when clouds are causing rain to fall upon earth.

item.title: 👯‍♂️ Gardening Sessions
item.description: We all need to have some gardening sessions don’t we? 2022 15-19 of June, London 3-6 of August, Haag

item.title: 📚 The Bookclub
item.description: In the book club we read books! Current bookclub schedule: The Common Toad, George Orwell (1946) – 2022.07.04 Brin’s Notes We Had To Remove This Post, Hanna Bervoets (2022) Jen’s Notes Occult Poetry

item.title: 📝 Brin's Notes: The Common Toad
item.description: General Notes I have read Orwells classics – Animal Farm & 1984 Most of the mentioned authors and books are alien to me, my context comes from purely reading the book My ability to analyse literature is very amateur The Common Toad His thoughts on the “need” to be in the nature remind me a lot of what I read/know so far about Walden.

item.title: 🔥 Pržganka
item.description: Pržganka, literally meaning the burnt soup, is a great lazy hungover meal that is bound to heal any problems you have with its warm delicate touch.

item.title: 🤨 How to Zine
item.description: How to start! It starts with an idea, and the need, of needing to put it out in the world. I make some notes about what this idea is and what I want to communicate, like writing this note here.

item.title: 🧑‍🌾 The Gardeners Guide to the Haunted Garden
item.description: This garden needs tending, otherwise the ghosts will get scared and wont show themselves. Right now, to get started with your gardening tools, please contact Ghost of Brin.

item.title: 🧚‍♀️ Garden Spellbook
item.description: There are many magical things that happen in the garden. Some of them are triggered by rituals that need to be performed over a longe period of time (eating a specific bread bun, over a year), others are momentary actions (like closing your eyes, tilling your head and remembering the moment) yet others are simply about enjoying the moment (letting rain fall on your face).
